nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_50
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If the characters in this comedy had been more humorous, it would have attracted a larger audience.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_51
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She has never lost faith in her own ability, so it is a possibility for her to become a successful actress.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_52
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I never had formal training, I just learned as I went along.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_53
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As their products find their way into the international market, their brand is gaining in popularity.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_54
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She could make up a story by saying she was knocked unconscious by thieves and that all her money was gone, but she doubted whether she could make it sound believable.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_55
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: No one was certain whether he postponed the visit on purpose, but this brought more criticism of him.
